instructions: From any Home screen, tap the Apps icon. Tap Settings . Scroll to 'PERSONAL' and tap Security . Tap Screen lock . Tap Password or PIN to make changes. Enter current password or PIN. Tap Next . Enter new password or PIN. Tap Continue . Enter new password or PIN to confirm. Tap OK .

From any Home screen, tap the Apps icon. Tap Settings . Scroll to 'PERSONAL' and tap Security . Tap Screen lock . Tap Password or PIN . Enter the password or PIN. Tap OK . Enter the password or PIN again to confirm. Tap OK . Tap OK again.

From any Home screen, tap Messages . Tap the MORE in the top right. Tap Settings . Tap Emergency alert settings . Tap Emergency alerts to set which alert types to receive. Move the switch to ON or OFF for the following: Presidential alerts (there is no OFF option) Imminent extreme alert Imminent severe alert AMBER alerts Tap the back arrow key. On Alert sound , move the switch to ON or OFF to have the Emergency alert sound played for the selected type of alert.

From any Home screen, tap Apps . Tap Gmail . Tap the Menu icon to the left. Tap the email account you wish to change the notification on. Scroll past the folders and tap Settings . Tap the account you wish to change. Check or uncheck Notifications to turn on or off sounds. Tap Inbox sound & vibrate to adjust the desired notification settings. Tap Sound to select the notification tone. Tap Vibrate to select or clear the check box and turn on or turn off vibrate notification.

From any Home screen, tap Apps . Tap Email . Tap the Menu key in the top right of the screen. Tap Settings . Tap Manage accounts . Tap your email address until it advances to the next screen, Scroll to 'NOTIFICATION SETTINGS'. Tap Email notifications to select or clear the check box and turn on/off email notifications. Tap Notification sound to select or change the notification sound. Tap Vibrate to select or clear the check box and turn on or turn off vibrate notification.

From any Home screen, tap the Apps icon. Tap Settings . Under 'Device,' tap Sounds and notifications . Under 'Sound,' tap Ringtones and sounds . Tap Ringtone and select the desired ringtone. Tap the back arrow in the upper left corner, the selection is automatically saved.
From any Home screen, tap Contacts . Tap the desired contact. Tap the Edit icon (pencil). Tap Ringtone . Tap the desired ringtone to assign it to the contact and then tap OK . Tap Save .
